means: （词语、引语等）使用过于频繁的，陈腐的，老一套的

sentence.Network_en: Power corrupts and absolute power absolutely corrupts. That's the old hackneyed phrase, but it's true.
sentence.Network_cn: 权力导致腐败，绝对权力导致绝对腐败。这虽是老生常谈，但却是真理。

sentence.Network_en: The hackneyed phrase came unintended to his lips.
sentence.Network_cn: 他顺口说了这句老掉牙的套话。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... lynx-eyed 目光锐利的，眼力好的 hackneyed 陈腐的，平常的 unalloyed 未掺杂的，纯粹的.
hack v．乱劈，乱砍，n．驽马hackneyed adj．陈腐的，平常的haemophilia n．血友病，出血不止

list.abs: here is what the book has to say on this hackneyed theme : " we strive to make our world comfortable for people of all stripes , thinking styles and hairdos even when they exceed our comfort level . "关于这个陈腐的主题，这本书不得不说的话就是：“我们努力让我们的世界让各种类型、思维方式和发型的人都感到舒服就算
Noone would like to accepts the hackneyed idea ., 没有人愿意接受陈旧的理念.
a soap opera with a hackneyed plot ;, 情节老掉牙的肥皂剧;
a carriage or hackney for hire ., 用于出租的马车或汽车.

entry.tran: （语句、画面等）陈腐的，陈词滥调的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a saying or an image as hackneyed, you think it is no longer likely to interest, amuse or affect people because it has been used, seen, or heard many times before.

example.ex: Power corrupts and absolute power absolutely corrupts. That's the old hackneyed phrase, but it's true.
example.tran: 权力导致腐败，绝对权力导致绝对腐败。这虽是老生常谈，但却是真理。

example.ex: ...hackneyed postcard snaps of lochs and glens.
example.tran: 老掉牙的苏格兰湖泊峡谷风景照片

means.word_mean: 1. repeated too often; overfamiliar through overuse;

auth_sentence.content: But despite the occasional hackneyed potboiler, this stuff works.
auth_sentence.res_content: But despite the occasional hackneyed potboiler, this stuff works.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But despite the occasional hackneyed potboiler, this stuff works.

auth_sentence.content: I found Titanic to be uninteresting with a hackneyed and unconvincing story.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I found Titanic to be uninteresting with a hackneyed and unconvincing story.

auth_sentence.content: Two of the most insistently reproduced, not to say hackneyed, images.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two of the most insistently reproduced, not to say hackneyed, images.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two of the most insistently reproduced, not to say hackneyed, images.
